name: Sleepwalkers
description:
During the day, Noah is the most ordinary guy, like your classmate or neighbor. But as soon as he falls asleep, another Noah wakes up–Woah, which Noah made up himself to cope with sleepwalking. But in the morning he doesn't remember anything…

Authors:
Konstantin Zhabinskiy (@zzzhabinskiy): Game Design, Development, 2D Art, UX/UI Design, VFX, Level Design
Vera Zhabinskaia (@veramufasa): Game Design, Story, Narrative Design, Level Design

Special thanks: Theodore Zhabinskiy, Stanislav Zhabinskiy, Elijah Straykov, Nikolai Korshunov, Simba & Rafa, itch.io сommunity

Third party assets: Kenney.nl (SFX, Sprites), "Dungeon" by Gothorlagee (Music)

It's our very first game and first participation in game jams, so we'd love to get any feedback from you. Please consider contacting our studio, Gridly Games
